level.heading: Severability.
level.text: If any provision of this chapter, or the application thereof to any person or circumstance, is held invalid, the remainder of this chapter, and the application of such provisions to other persons or circumstances shall not be affected thereby.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-71
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-71, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2401.
